description:
Kurotsuchi Nemu is the vice-captain of the twelfth squad; she is also the artificially created daughter of http://anidb.net/ch9348 [Kurotsuchi Mayuri]. She shows no emotion whatsoever and is extremely shy, often not saying anything at all. Though her "father" doesn`t seem to care about her whatsoever, Nemu remains extremely loyal and will follow his orders implicitly.
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Kurotsuchi Nemu
